text: Events from the year 1920 in Russia ==Events== * * * * * * * * ==Births== * 11 July –Yul brynner, Russian-born actor, singer, and director * ==Deaths== *9 March - Lidija Figner, revolutionary and a prominent member of the Narodniks (born 1853) ==References== Category:Years of the 20th century in Russia
title: 1920 in Russia
